row.entry: This is a denoise algorithm, which will work on chroma and/or luma.

sect4.title: Usage

sect5.title: Strength
sect5.para: The strength of the denoise. Higher values lead to a stronger effect.

sect5.title: Luma
sect5.para: Amount of denoise to apply on luma. Select carefully in order not to lose too much structure.

sect5.title: Chroma
sect5.para: Amount of denoise to apply on chroma. You can be much more aggressive with this parameter compared to luma.
